name: Roll&Throw
description:
This game is a submission to the Weekly Game Jam - Week 228

You play using the WASD keys to move.

To collect a snowball, get close to the pile of snow(left) and press Space. From there you can either lunge the small ball using the cannon for a small burst of damage, or go to the snow carpet(to the right) and hold LCTRL to roll it, making it bigger and more lethal.  Once that's done you have to walk up to the cannon and shoot your ball into the opponent's snow castle.
